hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ -e $(docker ps -aq -f "name=mysql") ] then echo No mysl docker running ... else docker rm -f mysql fi
if [ -e $(docker ps -aq -f "name=jdk_mvn") ] then echo No jdk_mvn docker running ... else docker rm -f jdk_mvn fi
if [ -e $(docker ps -aq -f "name=tomcat") ] then echo No jdk_mvn tomcat running ... else docker rm -f tomcat fi if [ -e $(docker ps -aq -f "name=computerdb-webapp") ] then echo No jdk_mvn tomcat running ... else docker rm -f computerdb-webapp fi
#docker rmi --force $(docker images -q) #docker rmi --force shask/mysql:2.0
docker run --name="mysql" -d shask/mysql:2.0 sleep 5 docker create --name="jdk_mvn" --link="mysql:localhost" shask/jdk_mvn mvn clean install docker cp . jdk_mvn:/. docker start -a jdk_mvn #Copy of .war from docker jdk-mvn to jenkins docker cp jdk_mvn:/root/.m2/repository/com/excilys/computerdb/computerdb/0.4.2/computerdb-0.4.2.war computerdb.war
#Create tomcat docker and cp the webapp in it docker create --name="computerdb-webapp" --restart=no tomcat:8.0 docker cp computerdb.war computerdb-webapp:usr/local/tomcat/webapps/computerdb.war docker commit computerdb-webapp shask/computerdb-webapp #stop testDB docker stop mysql
#push the webapp on my hub docker push shask/computerdb-webapp
bash /var/glazer-deploy.sh --host 192.168.10.225 --port 65000 --env MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=root mysql_deploy shask/mysql:2.0 bash /var/glazer-deploy.sh --host 192.168.10.225 --port 65000 --link mysql:localhost --publish 65312:8080 shask-computerdb-webapp shask/computerdb-webapp
